General.Name: Korea Circuit Co. Ltd
General.Description: Korea Circuit Co., Ltd. produces and sells PCBs worldwide. Its products include high density interconnection, package substrates, and rigid-flex PCBs. The company offers its products for use in home appliances, including digital TVs and PCs; and mobile devices, such as mobile phones, IC modules, solid state drive, and LCD products, as well as PDAs and memory. The company was founded in 1964 is headquartered in Ansan, South Korea.

1.Name: Cheol-Hong  Lim
1.Title: Director of R&D Center and Director
